name: Basic Toprock Moves
description: Master the foundational steps of breakdancing with proper posture and rhythm.

cards.title: Side Step
cards.description: A basic side-to-side movement that sets the rhythm for more complex footwork.
bulletpoints: Step side to side while maintaining a slight bounce
Move to the beat to create flow

cards.title: Crossover Step
cards.description: A dynamic movement where one foot crosses over the other in sync with the beat.
bulletpoints: Step forward and cross one foot over the other
Use your arms to guide the motion
Stay light on your feet for quick transitions
